title: Motion of boat before and after throw

content.question: As shown above, two students sit at opposite ends of a boat that is initially at rest. The student in the front throws a heavy ball to the student in the back. What is the motion of the boat at the time immediately after the ball is thrown and, later, after the ball is caught? (Assume that air and water friction are negligible.)

choices.label:
Immediately After the Throw
 After the Catch

Boat moves forward
 Boat moves forward

Immediately After the Throw
 After the Catch

Boat moves forward
 Boat moves backward

Immediately After the Throw
 After the Catch

Boat moves forward
 Boat does not move

Immediately After the Throw
 After the Catch

Boat moves backward
 Boat does not move

Immediately After the Throw
 After the Catch

Boat moves backward
 Boat moves forward

content.answer:
Immediately After the Throw
 After the Catch

Boat moves forward
 Boat does not move
